Description: Sliver of flattened handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium red-brown; washy slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Ion. Trimmed. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0369.18.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0372)
